0.5.name: wordpress/momentile-on-wordpress
0.5.description: This plugin allows you to display 1 or more of your latest Momentile photos (http://momentile.com) on your blog sidebar. The plugin supports both widgetized themes and non-widgetized themes - add the widget manually to your sidebar by placing in your themes sidebar.php file where you want it to be.
